fact_check_explanation_title: There is no evidence that people are dying from the Covid-19 vaccine
fact_check_explanation_summary: Some deaths and serious events have been recorded after vaccination, but none because of it so far

fact_check_explanation_title: Are 3 in 10 people failing to isolate?
fact_check_explanation_summary: Keir Starmer’s claim about self-isolation comes with many caveats.

fact_check_explanation_title: Guardian report on public opinion about job losses needs context
fact_check_explanation_summary: A survey found 47% of the population think job performance is an important factor in recent job losses, not necessarily the main reason.

fact_check_explanation_title: Agenda 2030 conspiracy just describes UN sustainability goals
fact_check_explanation_summary: There is no evidence that Covid-19 is being used to usher in rules that will enslave humanity as part of Agenda 2030.

fact_check_explanation_title: The link between vitamin D and Covid-19 is complex
fact_check_explanation_summary: Some studies have shown an association between vitamin D and coronavirus infections.

fact_check_explanation_title: Government advise special precautions for disposing of infectious PPE
fact_check_explanation_summary: In some places such as hospitals PPE is also disposed of as clinical waste.

fact_check_explanation_title: Nicola Sturgeon has not banned the Union Flag from Scottish government buildings
fact_check_explanation_summary: But she has instructed that the European flag be flown on a daily basis.

fact_check_explanation_title: A fake Metro cover shares false vaccine information
fact_check_explanation_summary: The real front page of the Metro on 16 February was completely different.

fact_check_explanation_title: There is evidence vaccines reduce risk of Covid-19 illness
fact_check_explanation_summary: Being ill with Covid-19 and getting infected by the virus that causes it are not the same thing.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence for drop in US sudden infant death syndrome cases
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post claims SIDS cases have fallen in the US by using a dataset which collects reports of a tiny fraction of the total.

fact_check_explanation_title: No evidence Boris Johnson said he wanted to “lop the heads off of smelly peasants”
fact_check_explanation_summary: A Facebook post claimed Boris Johnson said he’d like to live in the middle ages so he could behead “smelly peasants”.

fact_check_explanation_title: Some farmers dye their sheep, but a photo of a neon flock has been edited
fact_check_explanation_summary: This old mock-up goes viral all the time.
